translations: 一时的兴致，突发的奇想

sentences.sentence: He was forced to pander to her every whim.
sentences.translation: 她每次心血来潮他都不得不依随她。

sentences.sentence: We decided, more or less on a whim, to sail to Morocco.
sentences.translation: 我们多少有些心血来潮地决定乘船去摩洛哥。

sentences.sentence: A still picture could only imply the existence of time, while time in a novel passed at the whim of the reader.
sentences.translation: "一张静止的照片只是暗示了时间的存在，而小说中的时间则随着读者的幻想而流逝。
